attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MAXIMUM WAGE LIMIT
instead of your average working person having his wage capped by government legislation,its long over due that the "fat cats"bosses of privatised industries should have their earnings capped,why should the average working person pay through the nose for services to line their pockets,reduce their earnings and what is taken from those earnings should then be applied to advancements in the services they provide and reducing the costs levied on minimum wage earners for the services they provide
